welcome_message_body: Welcome to Amsterdam, a city known for its picturesque canals, historic architecture, and vibrant cultural scene. We hope you enjoy your time here and have the chance to explore all that this charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Bosco's Restaurant & Bar
restaurants.description: Bosco's Restaurant & Bar is a italian restaurant located in Amsterdam.
restaurants.address: 165 Division St (at Bayard St), Amsterdam, NY 12010

restaurants.name: Recovery Sports Grill
restaurants.description: Recovery Sports Grill is a american restaurant located in Amsterdam.

restaurants.name: Europa Cafe
restaurants.description: Europa Cafe is a café located in Amsterdam.

restaurants.name: Domino's Pizza
restaurants.description: Domino's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Amsterdam.

restaurants.name: Russo's Grill
restaurants.description: Russo's Grill is a italian restaurant located in Amsterdam.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal is the main international terminal at Schiphol Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is mainly used for European flights at Schiphol Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is used for intercontinental flights at Schiphol Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport handles all commercial flights and provides a range of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport is used for military operations and is not open to the public.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.
